turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about O2 Centre.
turn.2: O2 Centre The O2 Centre is an indoor shopping and entertainment centre on Finchley Road, London, near Finchley Road tube station.
turn.3: Where is the O2 Centre located?
turn.4: It is located in between Hampstead, West Hampstead and Swiss Cottage.
turn.5: Is there any other interesting information I should know?
turn.6: It also has a large car park.
turn.8: Now owned by Land Securities, previously X Leisure, and opened in 1998.
turn.9: Is the O2 Centre related to O2 anything?
turn.10: Despite the same name and originally very similar logo, it is no relation to the O2 telecommunications brand, which was launched 4 years later.
turn.11: Why is the O2 Centre called O2 Centre?
turn.12: The name was chosen as reference to the spacious feel of the building, as O is the chemical formula for dioxygen.
